criticalFailure.@en: The plants immediately die, and the earth where they grew is salted forever, as nothing can grow there ever again.

criticalSuccess.@en: You can cast Evergreen on 9+[WB] plants instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, a number of plants equal to 6+[WB] cannot wither or die through normal means, remaining perfectly preserved.

reagents.@en: Any plant you touch and a pinprick of your own blood
